records.name: Triton Prestige Seaview And Spa

descriptions.direction: Located in Maafushi, Triton Prestige Seaview and Spa is in a rural area and on the beach. Maafushi Harbor and Bolifushi Island Pier are worth checking out if an activity is on the agenda, while those in the mood for shopping can visit Chaandhanee Magu and Male Fish Market. With snorkeling, windsurfing, and fishing nearby, you'll find plenty of adventures in the water.
descriptions.general: Near Maafushi Mosque With a stay at Triton Prestige Seaview and Spa in Maafushi, you'll be on the beach, just a 3-minute walk from Maafushi Mosque and 6 minutes by foot from Maafushi Harbor. This beach hotel is 0.1 mi (0.1 km) from Rihiveli Beach and 0.1 mi (0.1 km) from Rannalhi Beach. Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer. Maafushi Mosque - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi Maafushi Harbor - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi Maafushi Reef - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi Rihiveli Beach - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi Rannalhi Beach - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi Gulhi Beach - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi Dhigufinolhu Beach - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi Bodu Hurraa Beach - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi Embudu Beach - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi The nearest major airport is Velana Intl. Airport (MLE) - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi Make yourself at home in one of the 50 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and designer toiletries. Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. Additional features at this hotel include babysitting (surcharge), tour/ticket assistance, and a picnic area. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle. Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the hotel's coffee shop/cafe. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, luggage storage, and laundry facilities.

records.short_description: Original hotel with 50 rooms, fitness center and meeting room
